dublin_core.dcvalue: This communications describes a novel approach to the analysis and development of telemedicine systems based on the multiagent paradigm An agent is an autonomous social reactive and proactive entity sometimes also mobile Since telemedicine is grounded on communication and sharing of resources agents are suitable for its analysis and implementation and we adopted them for developing a prototype telemedical agent
IEEE transactions on information technology in biomedicine : a publication of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society
Agents acting and moving in healthcare scenario--a paradigm for telemedical collaboration.
